title: Blog Page Generator
description: Build TSX blog pages with text and media blocks, then download the generated page file.
pageDescription: Compose a blog page with reusable blocks, preview it, and export a TSX file you can drop into your app.
aboutDescription: This developer tool helps you visually assemble blog pages and export a ready-to-edit TSX file. It is intended for internal/content workflows and does not auto-publish content.

sections.title: What You Can Build
content: Header and body text blocks with font, weight, and color controls
Body links with custom label and per-link color
Image, video, and audio blocks from URL or local upload for preview
Generated TSX output ready for your manual site-specific adjustments

sections.title: Workflow
content: Add blocks from the toolbox in the order you want
Configure text styling, links, and media source
Use Preview to verify page flow and appearance
Click Generate and Download TSX, then place it in your blog route
